Boston, MA • ONSITE • Senior Node.js Engineer • Starry (starry.com)

As a full-time Senior Node.js engineer, you would be responsible for the development of RESTful web services via Node.js as well as single-page web applications, in addition to building development tools, data aggregation & processing pipelines, performance optimizations, internal applications, and third-party API integrations.

Full job description here: https://starry.com/careers/senior-nodejs-engineer

Please send resumes and a link to your Github to kevin@starry.com
